name: manga-system
description: Complete manga management system with reader generator, bookshelf, and high-performance server

scripts.genreader:all: find ./æœ¬ -maxdepth 1 -type d -name '*.*' -exec basename {} \; | while read folder; do echo "Generating reader for: $folder"; python manga-server/scripts/htmlcmb_v3.py "$folder"; done
scripts.quick-setup: bun run config:auto && bun run genshelf && echo 'âœ… Ultra-Performance System ready! Run: bun run start'
scripts.quick-setup:interactive: bun run config:wizard && bun run genshelf && echo 'âœ… Ultra-Performance System ready! Run: bun run start'
